snippet: State Attorney General Pam Bondi sought a court order on Tuesday to allow the exhumation of bodies thought to be buried at the Dozier School for Boys in Marianna, which closed in 2011.
abstract: Florida Atty Gen Pam Bondi seeks court order to allow exhumation of bodies thought to be buried between 1900 and 1952 at Dozier School for Boys in Marianna; forensic anthropologists have found 50 possible graves at school, which was dogged by reports of extensive abuse for decades before its closing in 2011.
lead_paragraph: State Attorney General Pam Bondi sought a court order on Tuesday to allow the exhumation of bodies thought to be buried at the Dozier School for Boys in Marianna, which closed in 2011.

headline.main: Florida: Exhumations Sought at Reform School
headline.print_headline: Florida: Exhumations Sought at Reform School

keywords.value: Dozier, Arthur G, School for Boys
